column4: sorry for repeating the question ,but I really need your help.My brother's CD/DVD reader is old and extremely slow to the extent that prevented me from insalling ubuntu on it ....is there a way to install ubuntu in a fast way without downloading the alternate CD for text mode? Thanks in advance
there should be a minimal install cd available that downloads most stuff from the net. not sure it is available for feisty yet though ( see !install )
Thanks Jowi ..... I really appreciate your help
